text.section: A licensed professional engineer may prepare plans and specifications for and supervise the construction of structures as an incident to the practice of his own profession.

law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 190, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 332, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1980.
